item.description:
COST: $15.00
* **NOTE: There is a $3.00 off coupon in the Telegram & Gazette ( the actual ad)
You would need to bring the ad with you to get this discount. The show
is VERY popular. So, if you wish to go it's best to reserve your ticket ASAP.
CALL: 800-401-2221 to reserve your ticket
***Dinner @ 7 Hills Bistro (in the Crowne Plaza) before the show anyone????
** PRIME RIB BUFFET
Consisting of: Salad bar with over 20 items
Soup of the day
Hot Rolls & Butter
Oven roasted prime rib sliced to order
Chef's special entree ( chicken, pork, or fish)
chef's Pasta choice
Seasonal vegetables & potatoes
Seasonal warm dessert (s)
PRICE:" If you make a reservation with Dick Dohrety beantown Comedy Escape, we will seel you
the buffet for $13.95. (savins of $2.00) Just bring a copy of your ticket after you check
in. " Buffet only: $15.95 (taken from the website)
Reservations for the buffet begin @ 5:30pm
*NOTE: I have made our reservation for 7pm. It is listed as THE WORCESTER MEETUP GROUP.
See you there!.






The show is in the Ampitheater with no assigned seating. We can meetup before
I have scheduled the time for 8:30pm. This may change.
*****ANYONE interested in having dinner before the show? Please add it to your RSVP.


Joe Devito
R-Rated Hypnotist
Joe DeVito , professional stage hypnotist has been performing his stage hypnosis show for more than 15 years. His comedy hypnosis show has been seen nationwide and internationally. Stage hypnosis shows are dependent upon audience participation for an active experience and audiences who are pre-conditioned for willing participation will allow the comedy hypnotist to have a more encompassing performance. Joe's stage hypnosis show has been successfully performed in clubs, at fundraisers, high school and colleges as well as many special events.
www.dickdoherty.com
wwwcpworcester.com

Anyone interested?

_Jo
item.how_to_find_us: TBA: We will meetup before the show as it is general admisssion. There is a dinner reservation made for 7pm: THE WORCESTER MEETUP GROUP
item.why: I haven't been, but have been told this is a fun event!
item.name: COMEDY ESCAPE @ The Crowne Plaza
